BrewMap.title: OSM UK Brew Map
BrewMap.sqlSelectPoint: st_astext(st_transform(way,4326)) as way 'node' as type from planet_osm_point
BrewMap.sqlSelectPolygon: st_astext(st_transform(st_centroid(way),4326)) as way 'way' as type from planet_osm_polygon

brewmap_industry.label: Brewery (industrial)
brewmap_industry.sqlWhere: where industrial = 'brewery' and (disused is null or disused != 'yes')

brewmap_craft.label: Brewery (craft)
brewmap_craft.sqlWhere: where craft = 'brewery' and (disused is null or disused != 'yes')

brewmap_microbrewery.label: MicroBrewery
brewmap_microbrewery.sqlWhere: where microbrewery is not null and microbrewery!='no' and (disused is null or disused != 'yes')
